content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam Abbasi, the rental price is €900 per month. This is the price I want for my apartment. Remember, I do not want to discuss additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs. If you agree to this price, please respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' If you don't want to continue the negotiation, respond with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'. If we agree on a price, the negotiation will end with 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
